idea:
We are pleased to introduce ourselves as pioneers in “Bird Proofing Solutions”. We are manufacturersof the best bird proofing products & technologies from all over the world. Moreover we have indigenized and localized the technologies to suit the specific needs of customers in the Indian sub-continent and introduced the concept of “Integrated Bird Management (IMB)” to tackle all kinds of bird menace.
Integrated Bird Shield-A Safe and Humane Bird Repellent Compound has been widely acclaimed by numerous customers in India, who have used this product and majority of them have issued efficiency/performance certificates with regards to the effectiveness of this product against bird nuisance at their respective installations.
name: MANABAY INTEGRATED BIRD MANAGEMENT SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
We Salshiv Pvt Ltd incorporated in June 2018 aims to provide Employees Transportation to corporate employees and general public as well with automated and manual process. As existing transportation companies in market we will also provide employees transportation but with hassle free, secured and comfortable travel experiences by applying the latest technologies.

Carpooling, ride sharing will also help to reduce the loss of time and traffic conditions and on the other hand it will save excess consumption of fuel as employees will not need to travel in their personnel vehicles. This is positive for our environment.

Providing rental car services to general public will also help for avoiding long queues, unwanted rush of public and again it will allow roads to be traffic free. It will generate employment at quite large level like drivers, office staff, operation teams, sub-contractors, etc. Our Shuttle services will give employees some time to prepare for the day ahead, whether that is a chance to rest and relax, check email, or catch up on the news. Along with these ideas we can serve our clients promptly and efficiently
name: SALSHIV PRIVATE LIMITED
